title: Reviews
abstract: Knowledge, Education and Cultural Change: Papers in the Sociology of Education. Edited by Richard Brown. Pp. xii, 410. London: Tavistock Publications, 1973. £4.50. James Mill on Philosophy and Education. By W. H. Burston. Pp. viii, 254. University of London, Athlone Press, 1973. £4.00. Educational Research in Action. By N. J. Entwistle and J. D. Nisbet. Pp. 342. University of London Press, 1972. £3.60. Paperback £1.95. Intelligent Teaching. By H. S. N. McFarland. Pp. ix, 145. London: Routledge and Kegan Paul, 1973. £2.00. The Comprehensive School: Guidelines for the Reorganisation of Secondary Education. By Elizabeth Halsall. Pp. ix, 248. Oxford and London: Pergamon Press, 1973. £4.50. Compensatory Education. Edited by Maurice Chazan. Pp. 154. London: Butterworth, 1973. £3.50. Education Vouchers: From Theory to Alum Rock. Edited by James A. Mecklenburger and Richard W. Hostrop. Pp. 412. Homewood, Illinois: ETC Publications, 1972. $12.50. Paperback $7.50. Selection for University in Scotland. By J. L. Powell. Pp. 104. University of London Press, 1973. Paperback 8op. Integrated Studies in the Secondary School. Edited by David Warwick. Pp. 121. University of London Press, 1973. £1.70. Paperback 85p. Patterns of Community Education. By Eric Midwinter. Pp. 95. London: Ward Lock Educational, 1973. £2.00. Paperback £1.00. Creative Learning in Perspective. By Tudor Powell Jones. Pp. viii, 115. University of London Press, 1973. £ 1.50. Paperback 80p. Scientific and Technical Education in Nineteenth‐Century England. By Gordon W. Roderick and Michael D. Stephens. Pp. 173. Newton Abbot: David and Charles, 1972. £3.95. Between Harvard and America: The Educational Leadership of Charles W. Eliot. By Hugh Hawkins. Pp. xi, 404. Oxford University Press. £4.50. Catalogue of the University of Leeds Museum of the History of Education. Edited by P. H. J. H. Gosden and W. B. Stephens. Pp. 66+5 plates. University of Leeds, 1973.70p. The United Nations International School: Its History and Development. By Halina W. Malinowski and Vera Zorn. Pp. 184. New York: United Nations School, 1973. $6. Psychology and the Teacher. By Dennis Child. Pp. xii, 339. London: Holt, Rinehart & Winston, 1973. £1.45. The Free School. By Kenneth Richmond. Pp. viii, 211. London : Methuen, 1973. £2.90. Paperback £1.40. Assessment Techniques: An Introduction. Edited by Barrie Hudson. Pp. xiii, 223. London: Methuen Educational, 1973. £2.00. Paperback £1.35. Toward an Educational Theory for the Mentally Handicapped. By John McG. McMaster. Pp. x, 134. London: Arnold, 1973. £2.00.
